channel.title: Allowing Others To Connect Thru Port 43594
channel.description:
Well I have been trying to work this for the past 3 and a half hours and no luck letting others in. Immediately I was able to join into and play my server, but no one else could. I have no-ip downloaded and all set up. I also downloaded hamachi, although I was not able to make it thru tutorial because the "Test" server was full. Anyways, if someone could help me with this that would be very appreciated.
other info: im using phonescape my ip of server : thriller.no-ip.biz

item.title: Allowing Others To Connect Thru Port 43594
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

[quote=“thriller989, post:8, topic:53900”]it keeps saying to now go to their guide of routers… but my modem isnt on that list[br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2007, 07:12:40 PM[/size][hr]Sorry for the double post but id rather you not miss it. When I start up phonescape after compiling, the dos window comes up saying “connecting to phonescape server on 0.0.0.0:43594”

I have a feeling THIS may be the problem and that ip of 0’s should be mine instead of the 0.0.0.0[/quote]no the thing always says 0.0.0.0
or at least it does for me and i can get ppl to connect

Read full topic
